text: use both this parameter and |birth_date to display the person's date of birth, date of death, and age at death) --> | death_place = | death_cause = | body_discovered = | resting_place = | resting_place_coordinates = | burial_place = | burial_coordinates = | othername = Sally Jing | alma_mater = Beijing Film Academy | occupation = Actress | years_active = 2008-present | agent = Beijing Starlit Movie & TV Culture | partner = Zhang Jike (2018-2019) | awards = | website = | module = | module2 = | module3 = | module4 = | module5 = | module6 = | signature = | signature_size = | signature_alt = | footnotes = }} Jing Tian (, born 21 July 1988) is a Chinese actress. She is known for her roles in war epic The Warring States (2011) and the action movies Special ID and Police Story 2013 (both in 2013). She also starred in The Great Wall (2016), Kong: Skull Island (2017), and Pacific Rim: Uprising (2018). ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1989 births Category:Living people Category:Chinese movie actors Category:Chinese television actors Category:Chinese voice actors
